title: Happy Friday Everybody, Mr. Calhoun, Jim Brown, Kanye, MTH, Storm Update, NFL Picks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Friday Everybody, Mr. Calhoun, Jim Brown, Kanye, MTH, Storm Update, NFL Picks and more.
description:
Happy Friday everybody. Steve has a written statement that is read by Shirley about his brother Mr. Greg Calhoun. Jim Brown is making waves in the news and talks about taking a knee. Kanye West is being a more controversial version of himself and he got the community talking. J. Anthony Brown murders another one just for Mr. West. We have the latest regarding Hurricane Michael. Fool #2 talks about NFL week 6 along with his picks plus much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
